DOC.brief_summary: This trial evaluate public health intervention strategy trial aim reduce incidence HIV population-level . The propose strategy two step process : - Extensive HIV counsel testing , comprehensive prevention programme among target population - Immediate ART initiation HIV diagnosis , irrespective CD4 count criterion . The underlaying trial hypothesis HIV testing follow immediate ART initiation HIV-infected individual prevent onward transmission reduce HIV incidence population . This cluster randomise control trial total 22 community use unit randomisation . Enrolment population 22 000 individual among 4 400 expect HIV-Infected .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Immediate Versus South African Recommendations Guided ART Initiation HIV Incidence
DOC.detailed_description: The trial objective estimate effect ART initiate immediately HIV diagnosis reduction incidence new HIV infection general population . It conduct two phase : - First phase : aiming evaluate feasibility acceptability extensive HIV test early ARV treatment initiation subset target population ( Hlabisa sub-district KwaZulu Natal , South Africa ) ; completion February 2014 . - Second phase : full implementation trial target population May 2014 . The propose intervention two component : - Component 1 `` Test '' : HIV counsel testing , comprehensive prevention programme among entire target population - Component 2 `` Treat '' : ART treatment initiation HIV infected individual follow two strategy - control group : ART initiation eligible treatment per WHO guideline - intervention group : immediate ART initiation regardless immunological clinical staging
DOC.criteria: Aged 16 Member household designate cluster within Hlabisa subdistrict KwaZulu Natal South Africa Able willing give write informed consent trial participation and/or HIV counsel test
